org.jasr.currentcy.service

Interface EmailService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmailServiceImpl

    public interface EmailService
    Email Service for email persistence and sending. Methods serving as thin wrappers for methods in EmailDAO are left uncommented

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendUpdateEmails

        void sendUpdateEmails(Currencies currency,
                      java.util.List<Sample> changes)
        Method to send emails when the exchange rate changes. The change is detected when taking the periodic snapshot of all exchanges. The method loops through all the currently subscribed users to a specific exchange and send personalized emails to each of them. The method is not terribly efficient, as it does not batch the emails nor does it paginates the list of email addresses it takes from the database. This method executes asynchronously, once for each currency whenever a snapshot is taken.
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency that modified its value on the exchanges selected
        changes - the list of samples from exchanges taken from the snapshot that showed modifications on their rates

      • registerEmail

        void registerEmail(java.lang.String email)

      • unregisterEmail

        void unregisterEmail(java.lang.String token)

      • subscribeEmail

        void subscribeEmail(java.lang.String code,
                    java.lang.String email)
        Method to send the subscription email to users. If the user has already subscribed, the email will be resent with the same token. Repeating the subscription process has no new effect.
        Parameters:
        code - The code for the exchange to subscribe to
        email - the address of the user that wants to subscribe

      • sendRegisterEmail

        void sendRegisterEmail(java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String token)
